OOC( Average wolf weights in a 50 to 60 lbs.)

:Shadow Wing:
She looked at him and saw he was in no shape for anything, including 
walking. "Pamper you?"  She picked him up. "I'm not going to pamper 
you."  She walked towards the base. "I'm going to stick you in a CR 
chamber. Then when your feeling better, "she smiled"I'm going to kill 
you. You had me so darned worried about you I could just scream. I 
was pacing the ship praying that you would return safely." She held 
him close and nuzzled him. She voice softened and she whispered into 
his ear,"But I'm glad your home." She kissed the top of his head and 
walked to the base.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lunarpine turned his head, trying to hide the obvious,
> "I had fun"didn't you get the postcards?" he was trying to be 
strong but
> knew Shadow Wing could see right through him. "Glad to see ya Wing" 
he said
> with as much sincerity as he could muster.
> 
> "You think I look bad? You should have seen the other bot." The 
wolf nearly
> collapsed again but held himself up to look strong. "I can make it 
Wing, I'm
> not going to let you pamper me over a little scratch like this."
> 
> He tried to walk but knew that he could fall over at any moment.
> 
>
